response.original_title: Hurricane Maria: Stories From The Storm
response.overview: In the aftermath of the second deadliest storm in US history, Hurricane Maria left Puerto Rico's infrastructure utterly devastated. In the midst of an island-wide blackout, an overwhelming sense of community emerged as Puerto Ricans united to become stronger than the storm that devastated their homes.
response.tagline: Healing starts with a single story
response.title: Hurricane Maria: Stories From The Storm
